actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to provide duty-free treatment for dicofol until January 1, 1991, after the existing duty reduction for that chemical expires on September 30, 1985.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide, through December 31, 1990, duty-free treatment of 1,1-bis(4-chlorophenyl)-2,2-2- trichloroethanol (dicofol).

titles.title: A bill to provide duty-free treatment for dicofol until January 1, 1991, after the existing duty reduction for that chemical expires on September 30, 1985.
